meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>lid</radical> on your <radical>village</radical>, so you <radical>kick</radical> it over on its <kanji>backside</kanji> to see what's on its <kanji>underside</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: It turns out your village's own <kanji>backside</kanji> is covered in <reading>ura</reading>nium (うら). Eureka! You're all gonna be rich!
